title: #458. City of Compton with Jamar Neighbors
itunes:title: City of Compton with Jamar Neighbors
description:
Jamar Neighbors joined me on tour in Phoenix and told me all about growing up in Compton. Told me how he threw rocks at crack heads, beat people up, and almost got recruited to be in a gang but we both decided it's too much of a commitment. You gotta dress the same and they never give you time off. 

Make sure to listen till the end for Jamar's full album on Soundcloud.

For more Ari:

For more Jamar:

Jamar NFTs - Collection | OpenSea 

 

 

The Music:

Tupac - California Love

NWA - Straight Outta Compton

Compton’s Most Wanted - This is Compton

Jamar's Album
